text: Professor Russell Mardon Viner (born 1963) is the president of the Royal College of Paediatrics and Child Health.https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-52648557https://www.rcpch.ac.uk/about- us/our-team/professor-russell-viner-presidenthttps://www.ucl.ac.uk/child- health/people/viner-russell == References == Category:Living people Category:1963 births Category:Physicians of University College Hospital Category:Pediatricians Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:University of Queensland alumni
